name: workbench
description: Desktop app for task running with AI models and plugin tools
author: YakStacks

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run build:electron && electron ."
scripts.build:electron: tsc main.ts preload.ts doctor.ts permissions.ts --outDir . --esModuleInterop --module commonjs --skipLibCheck && node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.renameSync('main.js','main.cjs');fs.renameSync('preload.js','preload.cjs');fs.renameSync('doctor.js','doctor.cjs');fs.renameSync('permissions.js','permissions.cjs')" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');let c=fs.readFileSync('main.cjs','utf8');c=c.replace('require(\"./doctor\")', 'require(\"./doctor.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./permissions\")', 'require(\"./permissions.cjs\")');fs.writeFileSync('main.cjs',c)"
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 && node set-icon.cjs && electron-builder build --win nsis --x64 --prepackaged release/win-unpacked
